name: The Monster's Fate
description:
A short game about a soldier who turns into a monster and back. The goal is to find the cure before you are trapped as a monster forever.

This game was made for Kindred Games Community Jam #8.

This game is to be played in FULLSCREEN mode.

Controls: A&D or left-right arrow keys to move left and right. W&S or up-down arrow keys to climb ladders. Space to jump. Left mouse click or Q to attack.

Font: Manaspace by codeman38 https://www.1001fonts.com/users/codeman38/
